description: Resource Type definition for Metric Stream

MetricStreamStatisticsConfiguration.description: This structure specifies a list of additional statistics to stream, and the metrics to stream those additional statistics for. All metrics that match the combination of metric name and namespace will be streamed with the extended statistics, no matter their dimensions.

IncludeMetrics.description: An array that defines the metrics that are to have additional statistics streamed.
IncludeMetrics.markdownDescription:
An array that defines the metrics that are to have additional statistics streamed.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

AdditionalStatistics.description: The additional statistics to stream for the metrics listed in IncludeMetrics.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

AdditionalStatistics.markdownDescription:
The additional statistics to stream for the metrics listed in IncludeMetrics.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

MetricStreamStatisticsConfiguration.markdownDescription:
This structure specifies a list of additional statistics to stream, and the metrics to stream those additional statistics for. All metrics that match the combination of metric name and namespace will be streamed with the extended statistics, no matter their dimensions.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

MetricStreamFilter.description: This structure defines the metrics that will be streamed.

Namespace.description: Only metrics with Namespace matching this value will be streamed.
Namespace.markdownDescription:
Only metrics with Namespace matching this value will be streamed.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

MetricStreamFilter.markdownDescription:
This structure defines the metrics that will be streamed.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

MetricStreamStatisticsMetric.description: A structure that specifies the metric name and namespace for one metric that is going to have additional statistics included in the stream.

MetricName.markdownDescription:
The name of the metric.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

Namespace.markdownDescription:
The namespace of the metric.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

MetricStreamStatisticsMetric.markdownDescription:
A structure that specifies the metric name and namespace for one metric that is going to have additional statistics included in the stream.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: Metadata that you can assign to a Metric Stream, consisting of a key-value pair.

Value.description: An optional string, which you can use to describe or define the tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
An optional string, which you can use to describe or define the tag.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: A unique identifier for the tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
Metadata that you can assign to a Metric Stream, consisting of a key-value pair.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

StatisticsConfigurations.description: By default, a metric stream always sends the MAX, MIN, SUM, and SAMPLECOUNT statistics for each metric that is streamed. You can use this parameter to have the metric stream also send additional statistics in the stream. This array can have up to 100 members.
StatisticsConfigurations.markdownDescription:
By default, a metric stream always sends the MAX, MIN, SUM, and SAMPLECOUNT statistics for each metric that is streamed. You can use this parameter to have the metric stream also send additional statistics in the stream. This array can have up to 100 members.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

FirehoseArn.description: The ARN of the Kinesis Firehose where to stream the data.
FirehoseArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the Kinesis Firehose where to stream the data.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption

OutputFormat.description: The output format of the data streamed to the Kinesis Firehose.
OutputFormat.markdownDescription:
The output format of the data streamed to the Kinesis Firehose.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

ExcludeFilters.description: Define which metrics will be not streamed. Metrics matched by multiple instances of MetricStreamFilter are joined with an OR operation by default. If both IncludeFilters and ExcludeFilters are omitted, all metrics in the account will be streamed. IncludeFilters and ExcludeFilters are mutually exclusive. Default to null.
ExcludeFilters.markdownDescription:
Define which metrics will be not streamed. Metrics matched by multiple instances of MetricStreamFilter are joined with an OR operation by default. If both IncludeFilters and ExcludeFilters are omitted, all metrics in the account will be streamed. IncludeFilters and ExcludeFilters are mutually exclusive. Default to null.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: The ARN of the role that provides access to the Kinesis Firehose.
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the role that provides access to the Kinesis Firehose.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
Name of the metric stream.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: Replacement

IncludeFilters.description: Define which metrics will be streamed. Metrics matched by multiple instances of MetricStreamFilter are joined with an OR operation by default. If both IncludeFilters and ExcludeFilters are omitted, all metrics in the account will be streamed. IncludeFilters and ExcludeFilters are mutually exclusive. Default to null.
IncludeFilters.markdownDescription:
Define which metrics will be streamed. Metrics matched by multiple instances of MetricStreamFilter are joined with an OR operation by default. If both IncludeFilters and ExcludeFilters are omitted, all metrics in the account will be streamed. IncludeFilters and ExcludeFilters are mutually exclusive. Default to null.

Required: Conditional  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
A set of tags to assign to the delivery stream.
